name: Minesweeper!
description:
Enjoy Minesweeper!, the classic Windows 95 game, anytime on your device - FREE for iOS. This classic throwback game provides hours of fun on those slow days. Just try to avoid the bombs to clear the minefield and win the game! Apply strategy and logic to navigate various levels of difficulty and if you’re feeling confident, take a shot at the custom board builder for more challenging gameplay. This is perfect for fans of classic games such as checkers, chess, sudoku, solitaire and Tetris. Test your focus and keep your mind sharp with this nostalgic brain training app.

Game Features:
- Pinch to zoom tiles
- Monitor progress with a stats tracker and use it to beat top times
- Unlimited Minesweeper games with three different difficulty settings and a custom mode
- Game Center support for leaderboards and achievements
- Great statistics that help track your progress
- Adjustable levels of difficulty: Beginner, Medium and Difficulty
- User-friendly Flag Mode: Easily turn on flag mode to mark tiles
- Warns users how many mines are left
